title: Capacitors - 20 mm dia plates with dielectric of 8

content.question: A parallel-plate capacitor has circular plates, each with a diameter of <math alttext="20 millimeters" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>20</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi>mm</mi></math>. The plates are separated by a <math alttext="0.20 millimeter" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>0.20</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi>mm</mi></math> gap that is filled with a material that has a dielectric constant of <math alttext="8.0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>8.0</mn></math>. What is the capacitance of the capacitor?

choices.label: <math alttext="1.4 times 10 raised to the negative 11 power farad" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1.4</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mn>10</mn><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>11</mn></mrow></msup><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi></math>

<math alttext="1.1 times 10 raised to to the negative 10 power farad" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1.1</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mn>10</mn><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>10</mn></mrow></msup><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi></math>
<math alttext="1.6 farads" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1.6</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi></math>
<math alttext="13 farads" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>13</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="1.1 times 10 raised to to the negative 10 power farad" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1.1</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mn>10</mn><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>10</mn></mrow></msup><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi></math>

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
